title: Stanislav Shmelev: The Economics of Ecological Sustainability
itunes:title: Stanislav Shmelev: The Economics of Ecological Sustainability
description: Stanislav Shmelev, the director of Environment Europe Foundation in Oxford, discusses the many dimensions we need to consider when preparing our cities, businesses, and economies to the demands of ecological sustainability.
content:encoded: Stanislav Shmelev, the director of Environment Europe Foundation in Oxford, discusses the many dimensions we need to consider when preparing our cities, businesses, and economies to the demands of ecological sustainability.
